website_summaries.verdict: This model is off the charts in terms of aesthetics, and is suitable for use in small to mid-sized rooms.
pros: Boasts a trim, modern design with easy-to-use controls
Can extract as many as 12 litres of moisture from the environment each day
cons: A bit underpowered for large areas
Some inaccuracies in the humidity readout noted

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, avoid, avoid
customer_reviews.text: I have the 25L Meaco which is a miracle worker. This item should not have passed quality control, or design control, whichever is responsible. It doesn't matter what humidity target you set it up to, it keeps running and running and running and running (and barely captures any water because the room is not actually damp at some point...). Also to change the fan power up, one cannot press the fan button, one has to power down and then back up, or use the laundry mode, then get back to standard. I was so impressed by the 25L Meaco, I can't believe this product is so poor. Given the price, avoid, avoid, avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Laurisis

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Display has failed which now means I don't know what it's set to. Not built to last. Very disappointed as I'm going to have to buy another dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: great dehumidifier but
customer_reviews.text: it s a great dehumidifier and does all that it should but its a shame that the after sales is not better .I purchased a filter to go with this machine ,which turned out to be the wrong one , they would not exchange it or refund the cost of the filter because i had opened the package ,which i had to do to see if it would fit ! Considering the cost of the dehumidifier that i had just purchased and being a new customer i would have thought that they could have done something for the good will of the company but no, they left it to amazon to sort out, , which they did, thank you amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RTB

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful. Handle a bit difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I have bought it earlier. It's very efficient in dehumidifying and it's quite quiet. The only downside is that the handle is not really helpful making it a bit difficult to carry around different rooms. I had to buy a small dolly for pot plants to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M.

customer_reviews.title: >5L of water every day
customer_reviews.text: - I throw away a full tank (3L) of water after a night and almost full one in the evening. - It reduced condensation on the windows by 99%. Now I have to wipe them out only in extremely low temperatures outside. - I can now dry laundry indoors. - Automatic mode works really well. - Reasonably quiet. - Need to clean the tank from time to time (once a month or so). Otherwise the mould will build up there. I don't consider it to be the device fault. Any container full of water all the time will be mouldy at some point. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: pawel

customer_reviews.title: Great bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: We just replaced our Eco Air with this machine and it’s fab. We use it in our shower room that is essentially a cupboard with no ventilation. Our Eco Air was great however for something you need to use everyday this seems to be more powerful and has much better features like a digital humidity gauge and sleep timer. The sleep timer is great when you want it on and have to leave the house but don’t want it to run all day. It is more powerful/effective with less damp appearing in the bedroom (where we access our shower room). Noise wise it’s quieter however you can still hear it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: A quality built dehumidifier that does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few days but am impressed. Good quality build. Reduces the relative humidity to the target level that you set and does it fairly quickly. Used it to stop condensation on single glazed window which it did effectively. Also used it on the laundry setting to dry laundry which it did in a couple of hours. Quite heavy to handle and would have benefited from being fitted with castors but its a quality compressor type of dehumidifyer so its bound to have weight to it . Overall am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silent mode is too loud to have it on over night
customer_reviews.text: Its a decent product. Well packed, plastic quality is fine. Collects water quite well but silent mode is a unpleasant surprise... its really loud and its IMPOSSIBLE to keep it on in your bedroom over night.
customer_reviews.author: Barr

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an ageing Argos dehumidifier I'm very pleased with the silence of the low fan speed, the ease at which it wase set up and the efficiency so far. Set at 55% humidity (recommended) the unit is collecting about 5L of water a week and you can barely hear it. I've purchased a second one for our conservatory and that one is also as good as the first.
customer_reviews.author: PetethePrimate

customer_reviews.title: It's drying the world
customer_reviews.text: I've had this in my house for 2 days and it's pulled in so much water I'm beginning to think it's gonna turn the neighbourhood into a desert. Seriously though, very impressed with its performance. Only downside is it's a bit too noisy to leave on in an occupied room. Something I could have noted prior to purchase, it's a bit bigger than I first thought, so, check dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Kif

customer_reviews.title: Great dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Had a dehumidifier for a couple of years which was starting to get a little tired so thought time for an upgrade. After a bit research I chose this, mostly based on the noise level, and it has not disappointed. It is a lot quieter than my previous dehumidifier and the humidistat feature is great as it just turns on and off as needed. Definitely worth the money and very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Dehumidifer that works
customer_reviews.text: The dehumidifier does what it is designed for. It collects moisture from the air. The collection tray is simple to remove to empty. I would stress that I find it heavy to move from room to room but it can be done. A family member has also purchased one of these so that proves how efficiently our two families believe this unit to work.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Woman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: You know those cheap moisture capture devices that take 2-3 weeks to work? Don’t buy them, buy this instead. This product grabs the moisture from the air instantly. It’s slick, easy to carry, and easy to work. You want simple? This is it. I gather moisture levels should be between 40-50. I set this item at 45. Once it hits this mark, it turns off. You could get a pipe so it empties itself. I’ll get that later.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Torregrosa

customer_reviews.title: Extracted 20 l of water from my flat over the weekend
customer_reviews.text: I live in Edinburgh and we are experiencing unprecedentedly humid summer. Finally getting a dehumidifier was unavoidable. After 72 h I already see significant changes in the flat, the dump smell disappeared, rooms feel less humid. Best thing was drying laundry in only 6 h with the machine running in the room with them. I have no idea how cost effective this will be, and the machine is louder than I expected given it's one of the quietest out there; others must be really noisy. I'd say it's possible to watch a film in the same room, but not to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This wee machine has been on night and day after a flood in my house. It gets emptied twice a day, stops when it's full, I can't hear it, just a low hum in the room where it is working. It does work. Best thing I've bought for my house. It is not light but I'm an old lady and I can carry it up and down stairs. Tip: to replace the water carrier, tip ithe machine forward by 10 degrees and it slips in with no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Siusaidh Nicneill

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but this little beauty has changed my life. We used to get really bad condensation and black mould in all rooms of our house. This dehumidifier automatically turns itself on and keeps the humidity at or below the required level. Our washing dries much quicker now too. You can most certainly hear it when it is turned on, but that is a small price to pay for a mould free house. I wish I'd bought it two years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Greenfly556

customer_reviews.title: Fair product..
customer_reviews.text: I bought it mainly to dehumidify the moisture of the bathroom in winter. It is so humid in the bathroom after shower especially in winter. This dehumidifier do not operate greatly if the temperature is lower than 18C. I know this only after reading the manual. Therefore, I think it was just okay. Compared with the one I used different brand in Asia previously, this one is only fair. I still feel the moisture in the air. Probably the temperature is too low.. Another reason I bought it as it has an energy saving model - it won’t use too much energy. I think I should have bought the compressor type instead.
customer_reviews.author: cocomak

customer_reviews.title: Broken controls within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Had this 2 months and the digital controls have malfunctioned. Unable to contact the seller as they were closed over the christmas & new year period and unable to send back via Amazon as that is no longer an option after 30 days of order (?) so ended up having to purchase a replacement dehumidifier- chose a different brand from a different retailer and have to say I much prefer this new one. Far quieter and pulls the water from the air so much quicker! Now I just need to find out what I can do with the original, broken dehumidifier 🤔😥
customer_reviews.author: Mrs AF-D

customer_reviews.title: Best dehumidifier we have owned
customer_reviews.text: This unit works really well and I would recommend it to other people to reduce condensation inside a building. Pros- easy to clean the filter does the job well compact and looks good cons- It isn't that quiet but is no louder than any of the other brands of dehumidifier that we have owned It needs emptying once a day in out flat so perhaps we should have got a larger capacity
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Should have brought this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to keep condensation and the subsequent mould under control for years. Tried all sorts of chemical type ones and probably spent more on these over the years that this unit costs. Makes a huge difference. Takes a few weeks to get things back under control so was pretty much constantly on and needed emptying once or twice a day. But now just kicks in for a few minutes every so often. Seemed noisy at first but like with any new noise you get use to in and hardly notice this at all.
customer_reviews.author: James Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great dehumidifier for small homes.
customer_reviews.text: A very efficient, quiet and effective remedy for our bungalow condensation problems. Well made, easy to use and removed over 12 litres of water over 6 days first use. We now use it about every 3 days for a day and it removes around a litre. We could feel a different atmosphere in our rooms over this time and have no condensation on windows and door frames like before, as well as no more mould ! Well pleased with this purchase and would recommend for a small to medium sized home like ours.
customer_reviews.author: yorkieman

customer_reviews.title: MeacoDry Dehumidifier ABC Range
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to solve a condensation problem in a flat, and it has done the job. I am very pleased with this dehumidifier, it looks good and is very quiet in use compared to others that I have used. The humidity level required can be easily set and there is a laundry drying setting. There are no casters provided on this model, but for me this has not been a problem, as I did not need to keep moving the appliance.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: excellent in every aspect
customer_reviews.text: We were having mold problems in our lounge and had tried lower rated dehumidifiers without any noticeable success. as a last resort we tried this machine. It was delivered about 8pm we left it running on high fan setting all night and were both surprised and delighted to see that the humidity had dropped to our target of 45%. Since then we have left it running on low fan setting and have had no further problems. We did have worries about noise and when we first started using it, at low level, were aware of the noise but, after a short time, forgot about it.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up, worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant I’m genuinely shocked at how much moisture is in the air I air dry my washing, it was drying in a third of the time. Also has reversed moisture/humidity in the room that was starting to cause damp around the window. Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.author: antsmusic1

customer_reviews.title: Quite but not powerful
customer_reviews.text: I would say it is not very powerful at all . We could not get below 56% humidity ever if it was tuning for hours . Otherwise it is very quiet smal compact and very good looking
customer_reviews.author: Marcin

customer_reviews.title: Not up to the job of dehumidifying a small room
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our cottage which is quite small, but I’m really disappointed with it. The humidity started off at around 70% in our living room, but after a week of it being on constantly the humidity never falls below 65%. It’s a really small room too. (Humidity should ideally be around 50% which is what I set the level to on the unit) I think it’s quite pricey for a not very efficient unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant purchase
customer_reviews.text: We already have an Ebac dehumidifier and wanted one for another part of the house. This is super-good at collecting water. Literally have to empty twice a day as it’s pulling that much water from cooking and drying clothes etc. Much more than our Ebac.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for damp cupboards suffering from condensation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Had it in front of a corner kitchen cupboard that has suffered with condensation problems for years and it was half full after about 5 hours. Has reduced the humidiity in that cupboard from 75 down to 58 in 1 day - although I'm wondering how accurate the humidistat actually is as it does fluctuate randomly but overall I'm very happy with the product - the cupboard doesn't smell anymore!
customer_reviews.author: MISS T.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious as to how much of a difference this would make, but I was pleasantly surprised with the amount of moisture this sucks out of the air! I live in a 2 bedroom basement flat, which is very damp with mould starting to appear on all walls. I've had it running pretty much constantly now for a month and I'm emptying it every other day. I've cleaned the mould off of the walls and not one bit of it has returned!
customer_reviews.author: Mr T R Perry

customer_reviews.title: An effective unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: This little product is awesome. We have an average size, 1930s 3 bed house. It’s not cavity so we have an issue with condensation, one room in particular. We’ve used the product for 2 days now and collect 4 litres of water from air. Left all the doors open upstairs today, including the bathroom and there is no sign of condensation, even on the porcelain toilet cistern. It’s easy to set up and use and the humidistat is great as the unit powers down once it’s reached the target you set it at. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: richard hill

customer_reviews.title: Overpromised underdelivered
customer_reviews.text: So read the reviews and decided to purchase. Firstly comes with no instructions on how this works and I think I know why. This does not extract over 24hrs enough water to even fill the container it comes with never made it above the window at the bottom. I have tried different settings and it has changed nothing. Wasted my money on this product. What can I say very disappointed. Over promised under delivered.
customer_reviews.author: enclosedspaces

customer_reviews.title: perfect dehumidifer for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: I have a fitted wardrobe in our bedroom which has lots of damp in it. I've run this device all winter and never had a problem since. It is really quiet that you get used to its whisper-quiet hissing sound without noticing. This device is also auto shutdowns completely when the targeted humidity is met and only runs once in half an hour to keep the target.
customer_reviews.author: Emre O.

customer_reviews.title: Best dehumidifier we've had yet!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little workhorse. Purchased in October it has been going strong ever since with only the odd day or two when it has not needed to extract. No more moisture in the kitchen /conservatory area. And it extracts really quickly. Also, the laundry through the winter months is dried fast. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well
customer_reviews.text: After spending hours trying to work out which dehumidifier to buy and how much to spend, I settled on this one. Who's to say if one of the others would have been a better choice but I'm really pleased with this unit. It dries laundry and also dried out my damp utility room very well indeed. I did notice the effect of running it day and night for 3 weeks on my electricity bill but I'm only going to be using for a couple of days a week now so I'm happy with the energy consumption on that basis. I've had it for a couple of months now and it's been a good solid unit so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phil Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great efficient quiet dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Great dehumidifier, compact and stylish . It has removed litres of water from a slightly damp bedroom in 3 days . Damp smell has gone , the air feels cleaner , and a better nights sleep also ! It is quiet , especially at low fan speed and can sleep without annoyance . Easy to empty water tank. Highly recommended if it continues this performance .
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Quietly effective!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this machine. It is my second Meaco dehumidifier and much better than my original. Not too noisy but incredibly effective. I live in a damp environment, so keeping the damp out of the house can be difficult. This has really helped and I couldn't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Should have buy this year's ago! As soon as this arrived I have turned it on, 3 days/nights later I have emptied FULL tank of water 5 times plus some quick emptying in between. My house feels drier (large 2 bed). Wasn't sure if this would do any good, now I'm recommending it to everyone! This Meaco dehumidifier is very easy to use, looks very nice and seems like it does the job. Get it, its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: My house is very humid but thanks to this dehumidifier things are getting better. I can sleep better and I can wake up without feeling I just had a shower! The noise level is overall acceptable, although it is quite tricky to set a humidity level and make sure the dehumidifier stops at that point. It might be it is just me not being very good with electronic machines :)
customer_reviews.author: Federica

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Not even had the product 24 hours so can’t comment on reliability but I’m astonished at how much water this thing is able to suck out from the environment! If you don’t have a tumble drier and are limited to drying clothes indoors then I’d highly recommend. Had about 1.5 litres of water from our kitchen area this afternoon. It’s a little louder than our oven - not too noticeable in day to day life but will be absolutely fine overnight which is when I intend to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin C

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Despite being supposed to cut out when the water tank is full, it overflowed and soaked my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mr H F G Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was not disappointed. I’ve had it for 4 days now and I can honestly say that my wet windows in a morning are a thing of the past. It’s really easy to use with 2 fan settings, as you would expect the noise from the higher setting would not be suitable for night use, but setting one is really quiet I’d read that emptying the water tank was a bit tricky, but I’ve not had any difficulties. The air that blows out of the top is dependant on the room temperature. I’m really pleased and it’s been more than adequate for my 3 bedroom house, as I didn’t want an unsightly large machine
customer_reviews.author: jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Works brilliantly
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with my purchase. It is efficient, quiet, looks neat, easy to move & altogether I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: The Meaco does its job well, mainly keeping down condensation whilst drying clothes. The amount of water it extracts is quite impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Przemyslaw Wilk

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The Meaco does its job well, mainly keeping down condensation whilst drying clothes. The amount of water it extracts is quite impressive! A word of caution is that it isn’t very portable, having no wheels and possibly too heavy for many. So if you want to leave this in one place it is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our flat. Wish I'd bought this ages ago! Noise is fine and goes off when the humidity reaches the target 55%. Looks good too. Only improvement would be to have the option to buy casters to make it easier to move around and more stable. There are holes in the bottom where casters could go but I can't see them for sale on the Meaco website. Still given 5 stars though as the dehumidifier is great and I would buy again if needed another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart and looks good
customer_reviews.text: It's very very simple to use switched on mains that is, the manual explained the switch buttons however someone may gets confused the machine stopped running as due to the recommemed settings on 50 the digital shown 37 as because the room humidity is below. The manual should explain on this issue otherwise may think it is faulty., Machine is not running.
customer_reviews.author: april rain

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, not great
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this following reading various reviews online. It seems to work fine in general, condensation on windows is reduced, but certainly doesn't dry washing as some other reviews seem to imply. Is it worth the money? I'm not convinced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally quiet. Works very well for small 1-bedroom cottage with pre-existing mold/damp problem. Has noticeably improved the air quality. Also helps with speed of drying for towels, clothes, etc. on airer. Must empty reservoir generally once a day, which seems to prove that it does its job. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ktp

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful or we have a faulty one
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2 bedroom bungalow and this dehumidifier does not seem to be powerful enough to bring moisture levels down enough. It has been on for nearly a month, constantly running and moisture levels do not go below 65... we have had some rain but also dry days and even then it struggles. would also be nice if it had wheels under it to ease moving it. disappointed. Previous Ebac dehumidifier had no problem keeping the house dry.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McClung

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. The sound levels are OK but its major advantage is power consumption. According to my Kill-a-watt meter, it never exceeded 160 Watts which is essentially more than 50% less than our old dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: GTJ

customer_reviews.title: Great device works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent takes all the moisture out of damp rooms very portable
customer_reviews.author: becks

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: We were amaze with this dehumidifier!! It work wonders. We live in a ground floor flat, damp is everywhere and started building up mou that I need to scrub it every other week using bleach. One day my husband keeps on coughing, and my friend suggested to me to try meaco dehumidifier as she also have same problem in her flat. I did not regret at all buying this product... I will highly recommend this dehumidifier 👌
customer_reviews.author: Weng

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great and is very easy to use. I would recommend it. It would be great if it had small wheels to move to different rooms but is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Ap1

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this earlier. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought it to take care of the humidity in the flat. The delivery was super fast; we switched it on soon after receiving it and after running for 1/2 a day, the water container was full so it really did a great job. It’s a bit noisy (even with the lower noise level) but it does exactly what it’s supposed to do so really good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Can not use external timer.
customer_reviews.text: General at home humidifier to reduce window condensation during the winter months. Works great but impossible to use with an external timer as it doesn't switch on with power on, you have to hit the button on the machine.
customer_reviews.author: blair

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit good performance and good value for money in the long run due to its efficiency and effectiveness. Spend more upfront to save money in the long run on running costs !
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: It switches off by itself, even when isn’t full
customer_reviews.text: What I dislike about it, is that it switches off by itself. Even when the tank isn’t full, hence the 3 stars. I don’t know if I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Good product, happy with the way it works
customer_reviews.text: Right ,we live in very small flat and we have very serious problem with moisture and black mould . Over all we love this product but there are few things to be considered. First of all it is bit heavy and difficult to move around the flat and second it feels that you need more than one or at least in our case. This is a expensive product and I do like it I just think that there is a room for improvement
customer_reviews.author: Elena Rupprecht

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We used to have a mould problem - this helped to get rid of it. Also great for drying clothes. Yet to see the electricity bill though, but hopefully won't be too bad.
customer_reviews.author: aiste

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research before buying one and definitely worth paying a little bit extra for a brand. Reliable and cheap to run compare to other machines
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Kostka

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dehumidifier as I had a condensation problem in my flat. The Meaco I bought is very efficient at eradicating this problem. It is quiet during operation and economical to run. The only slight quibble is the capacity. It needs emptying once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Not the cheapest but a very good dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit that works to really well. Stuck it in a bathroom that had never been dry for years and I had replastered part of the ceiling. Humidity down to 55 % within four days great bit of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Fletch

customer_reviews.title: MONEY WELL SPENT
customer_reviews.text: ONE OF THE BEST BUYS I HAVE MADE IN A LONG TIME. WORKS SO WELL NO MORE WET WINDOWS AND I AM AMAZED AT THE WATER EACH MORNING IN THE TANK. DO NOT PUT OFF BUYING YOU WILL BE SO PLEASED. IT IS HEAVY BUT WE HAVE HAD IT IN THE SPARE BEDROOM UPSTAIRS AND THE DOWNSTAIRS WINDOWS HAVE NO CONDENSATION.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Notman

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Already had a 10L which was good and passed it on to my son for his conservatory. Decided to get the 12L to replace it. Works quietly even on full speed and does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyb

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and not too noisy. I bought this to use in a one bedroom flat and it’s since stopped condensation on the windows. I used to get such bad condensation that I had to clean the window sills with diluted bleach every month to stop mould growing. I don’t have to do this any more. The clothes drying option is also very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cellar Mould Free
customer_reviews.text: The product is better than I expected. It is relatively quiet and extracts 2.5L every 24 hours. The operation is simple. I have not had the product long enough to ascertain its durability but it appears a good solid construction. I would buy the product again if required.
customer_reviews.author: R Johns

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: It looks so neat and is much quieter than my previous one
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: It works well!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as my old Pro breeze was running poorly. This item has made a massive difference. The air in the house smells more crisp and cleaner/drier. Daughters cough has gone down as humidity with toddlers is not good. It cuts out when it reaches the required percentage and resets when it increases. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant machine
customer_reviews.text: Perfect machine, has a laundry setting and two fan speeds, not the quietest but it is not annoying and can be quite a soothing sound. Their is an option to have the display lights turned off so doesn't light up when your sleeping and my god does it collect a lot of water. Absolutely love it and have recommended it to friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than expected! Efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Sited in our conservatory and been pleased with the results. Dries off condensation very well with multiple settings
customer_reviews.author: George Stock

customer_reviews.title: Dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Much quieter than my previous old model. Only issue is when full it is difficult not to spill when removing the back container. Also needs practice to replace the back after emptying but a,round it is a good value buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great efficiency and design. Draws so much water out of our house. Didnt know it was that full of moisture. Great for whole 2 bed apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job! I leave it on in the lounge at night and in the morning the tank is full of water. With the laundry options clothes are almost dried in 6 hours. I don’t leave it on during the say cause it blows out cold air which make the heating pointless but overnight is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Efficient quiet little device
customer_reviews.text: Really like this device. Made such a difference to my flat which suffers from damp air accumulation quite badly due to its layout. The whole place just smells better now and stopped the black spots forming. The noise is actually a quite soothing low white noise hum, makes me think of hotel room AC. I haven't tried but I could probably sleep through it. Overall works a treat, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AndMan

customer_reviews.title: Quantity product, nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet dehumidifier, also pulls in the moisture quickly, it's a bit heavy, but no plans to move it
customer_reviews.author: Jaybee

customer_reviews.title: Great Meaco quality.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a bit of time reading up on this before purchase. This is very quiet for a compressor dehumidifier so I am able to leave it running overnight if required. The machine is built well and seems like it will be reliable. This machine has not been reviewed by which yet but I am sure it will sell on it's quiet operation, modern looks and energy efficiency. Well done Meaco, 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Good performance!
customer_reviews.text: This unit has proved to be really helpful. It's nice and quiet. I run mine upstairs all day and downstairs all night without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product of 2020
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. If you’re thinking of getting a dehumidifier this is the one. Looks good, it’s quiet and most of all it does what it says on the tin. Less reading, more buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymal Tailor

customer_reviews.title: Great dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Not too noisy at all and stops all the condensation we used to get in bedroom at night would definitely recommend this dehumidifier
customer_reviews.author: paul 84

customer_reviews.title: Dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifier works well fills up with water and looks good too although is fairly noisy
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Well designed, efficient and effective. Really pleased with this dehumidifier, perfect for my conservatory.
customer_reviews.author: FionaMac

customer_reviews.title: I am very impressed with this dehumifier.
customer_reviews.text: The only negative I have it is a bit heavy for me to lift. Otherwise I am very happy with this, I had to replace my dehumifier as it stopped working. I also read the good reviews from Which.
customer_reviews.author: problem solved

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about its longevity
customer_reviews.text: On the face of it, it looks to be a very good machine. It isn't too noisy and the extraction seems good. However, the childlock feature broke within a few weeks so I am not sure of its longevity.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Relieved we went for this purchase. Has seen us through winter so far. No condensation and no damp smell when walk in to our home. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lanneq

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one i have purchased to give as a gift...they are such good pieces of kit...every home in uk should have one...
customer_reviews.author: Flossie

customer_reviews.title: low level
customer_reviews.text: have it on lowest setting for least noise, and it works well, no more wet windows and humidity levels are low. Very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit does as it says on the packet
customer_reviews.text: Neat and small unit easy to fit in. Removes moisture from Windows etc saving time and kitchen towel
customer_reviews.author: Denise Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: High pitch buzzing noise
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if the unit we received had a fault, but there was a very annoying high pitch noise whilst running that drove me nuts within a few seconds. Going to return the item, as I specifically purchased this for low noise levels.
customer_reviews.author: annie_c

customer_reviews.title: Suck the moisture out
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Louder than some, but not loud by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Jon_&_Richie S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device noticed difference almost immediately. Only slight problem is it a bit heavy to move around. Would recommend it to anyone..
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dicker

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not so silent as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is great product, very compact and easy to use. However it is not quite silent as is written in the spec: 36db in lower fan. I have some db device which shows clearly 44db in 1m from the Maeco. Apart of this I’m very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: GregoriusV

customer_reviews.title: Happy house
customer_reviews.text: What i got this the humidity was 65% or higher. It now sit at the 50% i have set it at. And is removing around 1.5L a day to keep it there. So i am very happy and hopefully will be getting no black mold this winter. Its also very very quiet you dont know its even running
customer_reviews.author: andrew thacker

customer_reviews.title: Great dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic dehumidifier. Dries washing in no time & keeps humidity levels down. No more condensation on windows
customer_reviews.author: Oxfordshire

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, works really well to dry clothes. Quite heavy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Cfarr

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product but requires wheels please
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product compact but I wish these products have wheels on them got to lift the lovely
customer_reviews.author: lilly george

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works brilliantly in my bedroom. It’s set on a timer plug to come on a few hours in the day and evening. Works great and humidity levels match my thermometer. A little too nooses to have on at night
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Soon fills up don't know where all the water comes from.
customer_reviews.author: SHANTELL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant easy too use and quiet. Great for drying laundry indoors.
customer_reviews.author: James Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a damp bedroom , only had it for a month but so far performing perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: clive Thackwell

customer_reviews.title: Meaco is great
customer_reviews.text: This is the only reason I can live in my flat under underlying damp issues are resolved. It arrived on time which is appreciated. It’s quiet compared to others I’ve had but of course things can always be quieter. A friend has already bought this on my recommendation and she’s happy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
